content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_planks
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 24, "index": 22}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 9, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft acacia_planks. Acacia_planks requires placing 1 acacia_wood in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the acacia_wood from slot 15 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_planks
inventory=[{"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 24, "index": 22}, {"type": "turtle_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 9, "index": 35}, {"type": "end_rod", "quantity": 24, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I can craft the acacia_planks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
